BREAST-COMPOSITION: fibro fatty and glandular breast parenchyma (ACR B).
FINDINGS: Suggestive but not diagnostic of a benign lesion; requires further evaluation with short-term follow-up or additional imaging. A small, well-defined irregular opacity is noted in the upper outer quadrant of the breast. No microcalcifications are observed. Skin, nipple, and pectoral muscle appear normal. No significant axillary adenopathy.
